faqs.question: How long does galvanized chain link last?
faqs.answer: Standard galvanized chain link lasts 15-20 years. Vinyl-coated chain link extends this to 25-35 years due to the additional protective layer over the galvanization.

faqs.question: Is chain link good for dogs?
faqs.answer: Yes, chain link is excellent for pet containment. The woven mesh prevents dogs from squeezing through, and we can add dig guards at the base for escape artists.

faqs.question: Can I add privacy to chain link fence?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer privacy slats that weave through the mesh, providing privacy and wind reduction. Available in tan, green, black, and other colors.

faqs.question: What gauge should I choose?
faqs.answer: 11-gauge is standard for residential use and handles normal wear well. 9-gauge (commercial grade) is recommended for high-traffic areas, large dogs, or security applications.
